title: Create an Action on a Issue
name: CreateActionIssue
description: This allow to create an Action (Status Change or Comment) to an Issue

Success 200.description: The type of the action (Comment or Status Change)
The new status of the issue (only if its a Status Change)
The content of the comment (only if its a Comment)
The date of creation of the issue

Error 4xx.description: The issue has some parameters with unexpected token

title: Create an Issue
name: CreateIssue
description: This allow to create an issue with the right parameters

Success 200.description: The type of the action (Comment or Status Change)
The new status of the issue (only if its a Status Change)
The content of the comment (only if its a Comment)
The date of creation of the issue

Error 4xx.description: The issue has some parameters with unexpected token
There are missing parameters or uncorrect types

examples.title: Response (Validation Error):

title: Delete a Issue
name: DeleteIssue
description: This allow to delete a specific Issue with its Id

title: Get all the actions of an Issue
name: GetActionIssue
description: This allow to get all Actions (Status Change or Comment) of an Issue

Success 200.description: The type of the action (Comment or Status Change)
The new status of the issue (only if its a Status Change)
The content of the comment (only if its a Comment)
The date of creation of the issue

title: Find a specific Issue
name: GetIssue

Success 200.description: The type of the action (Comment or Status Change)
The new status of the issue (only if its a Status Change)
The content of the comment (only if its a Comment)
The date of creation of the issue

title: Get Issues in a period of time
name: GetIssuesBetweenDates

The content of the comment (only if its a Comment)
The date of creation of the issue

title: Get solved Issues in a period of two dates
name: GetIssuesBetweenDatesWithStatus
description: This allow to get all the solved Issues in a period of two dates. You can change solved by all other types of status

Success 200.description: The type of the action (Comment or Status Change)
The new status of the issue (only if its a Status Change)
The content of the comment (only if its a Comment)
The date of creation of the issue

The new status of the issue (only if its a Status Change)

title: Verify the Issue exists
name: VerifyIssue
description: This allow to test if the issue sended is on the server. This function is used in all the routes who need a issue verification

Success 200.description: The type of the action (Comment or Status Change)
The new status of the issue (only if its a Status Change)
The content of the comment (only if its a Comment)
The date of creation of the issue

name: getIssuesUnsolvedBetweenDates

The new status of the issue (only if its a Status Change)

title: Create a Tag
name: CreateTag
description: This allow to create an tag with the right parameters

Success 200.description: The date of the creation of the tag

Error 4xx.description: The type has some parameters with unexpected token
The keyword(s) doesn't have the correct type or is required

examples.title: Response (Validation Error):

title: Delete a Tag
name: DeleteTag
description: This allow to delete a specific tag with its id

name: FindTag
description: This allow to get a specific tag with its id

Success 200.description: The date of the creation of the tag

name: GetTags
description: This allow to get all the existed tags on the server

Success 200.description: The date of the creation of the tag

name: UpdateTag
description: This allow to update a specific tag with its id

Error 4xx.description: You have send wrong parameters or send a wrong type of data

name: VerifyTag

Success 200.description: The date of the creation of the tag
